subject: ATTENTION MY DEAR FRIEND,
body:
ATTENTION MY DEAR FRIEND,
GOOD MORNING TO YOU, PLEASE NOTE THAT I AM THE CHAIRMAN, WOOD FOREST
NATIONAL BANK, CORPORATE HEADQUARTERS IN THE WOODLAND TEXAS SO I JUST
WANT TO USE THIS OPPORTUNITY TO ANNOUNCE TO YOU ABOUT $2.5 MILLION
WHICH IS 
THE ANNUAL COMPENSATION FUNDS FROM UNITED NATION TO YOU AND
YOUR ENTIRE FAMILY
 .
PLEASE UNDERSTAND' THAT MANY OTHER INDIVIDUALS AND FAMILIES HAS ALL
RECEIVED THEIR MONEY SO
 YOU ONLY NEED TO FORWARD YOUR ACCOUNT NUMBER
FOR THE BANK TO BANK PAYMENT TO YOU 
OR DO YOU WANT TO RECEIVE WOOD
FOREST NATIONAL BANK ATM CARD OR BANK DRAFT FOR THE TOTAL $2.5 MILLION
TO YOU?.
PLEASE QUICK  RESPONSE AND YOUR GOOD OPINION IS HIGHLY IMPORTANT SO
THAT THE FUNDS WILL BE RELEASED TO YOU WITHOUT ANY PROBLEM.
CONTACT EMAIL :woodorestanakofficelile@gmail.com
BEST REGARDS,
MR. DAVID MENDEZ,
CHAIRMAN
WOOD FOREST NATIONAL BANK,
CORPORATE HEADQUARTERS
ADDRESS:1330 LAKE ROBBINS DR IN THE WOODLAND TEXAS

subject: Re: ATTENTION MY DEAR FRIEND,
body:
Hello Mr. David Mendez,

Good morning to you as well. Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I must say, it sounds quite interesting. Could you please provide me with more details about this annual funds from the United Nations? How exactly does it work and what is the purpose of these funds?

Also, I would like to know more about the options you mentioned for receiving the funds. What are the advantages and disadvantages of each method? And how long does it usually take for the funds to be transferred or delivered?

I appreciate your prompt response and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Otis
